channel.title: Forum suggestions
channel.description:
If you have a suggestion for the forum, please post in here.
Edit: If it results in a lot of discussion, a moderator will split it off into it's own thread.

item.title: Forum suggestions
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“Rix_, post:94, topic:326626”]I think it’s a bad idea.
[hr]
[size=8pt]2 people like this: t4, BloodRayne[/size][/quote]

It doesn’t look too bad

Read full topic

item.title: Forum suggestions
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:90, topic:326626”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=423039.msg3832596#msg3832596 date=1322693764]
Can we have a feature to show those who approve a post? Kind of like a “thanks” system from a certain other RSPS forum, but just something to show who approves of a post
[/quote]

IMO that’s too similar to rep, a person shouldn’t need an incentive to post something, if they want to help out, they should post it and not care who approve sof it[/quote]

But people will be more likely to post quality posts if there is an incentive for doing so

Read full topic

item.title: Forum suggestions
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:90, topic:326626”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=423039.msg3832596#msg3832596 date=1322693764]
Can we have a feature to show those who approve a post? Kind of like a “thanks” system from a certain other RSPS forum, but just something to show who approves of a post
[/quote]

IMO that’s too similar to rep, a person shouldn’t need an incentive to post something, if they want to help out, they should post it and not care who approve sof it[/quote]
It can be good to give people an incentive, it can create a helpful community (Not that it isn’t) even if people only do it to enlarge their e-penis.

Read full topic

the ranger squad seal of approval!

item.title: Forum suggestions
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

Teh Spede:

Tapatalk doesnt have this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=unread

Ok so lets write our own app. I’m fine with the “latest” option tapatalk offers but of we’re going to fix this problem wed better try to please everyone so we dont go down this road again in a month or two.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum suggestions
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

Tapatalk doesnt have this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=unread

item.title: Forum suggestions
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Tapatalk isn’t ‘free’ as in speech. And I don’t think you can even post with the ‘free as in beer’ version can you? Making it useless.

Wtf is free as in beer?
I don’t see why you don’t just install it and let us worry about where we get it from.
My milestone is being incredibly laggy and the browser is possibly the worst at points. Tapatalk or a dedicated application would solve my problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum suggestions
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:79, topic:326626”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=423039.msg3485875#msg3485875 date=1296575885]
Why don’t we just write an android/iPhone app as a community project that browses the forum.

That way it’s free, can be open source and is educational.

Plus it’s pretty damn basic.

Heck, we could add optional IRC integration if we really wanted.
[/quote]
Well Tapatalk is easily free for Android, but I’m more than willing to write our own.
I’ve been getting into writing apps for Android, but never done anything I’m happy with.[/quote]

Tapatalk isn’t ‘free’ as in speech. And I don’t think you can even post with the ‘free as in beer’ version can you? Making it useless.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum suggestions
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

Just add this link already http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=unread and the mobile theme will be epic

Read full topic

item.title: Forum suggestions
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:80, topic:326626”]I kinda agree with pwnd’s opinion for the most part, but in all-out boredom situations I wouldn’t mind this.

I’ve only used that taptalk application once for droid related forums and didn’t have a problem with it, so what the hell. Try it out or have someone contribute an app. Appeal to the no life’s here.[/quote]
What about those who have a desktop and feel like browsing the forums in bed, or somewhere other than your computer. Is that so wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: Forum suggestions
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I kinda agree with pwnd’s opinion for the most part, but in all-out boredom situations I wouldn’t mind this.

I’ve only used that taptalk application once for droid related forums and didn’t have a problem with it, so what the hell. Try it out or have someone contribute an app. Appeal to the no life’s here.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum suggestions
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:77, topic:326626”]Why don’t we just write an android/iPhone app as a community project that browses the forum.

That way it’s free, can be open source and is educational.

Plus it’s pretty damn basic.

Heck, we could add optional IRC integration if we really wanted.[/quote]
Well Tapatalk is easily free for Android, but I’m more than willing to write our own.
I’ve been getting into writing apps for Android, but never done anything I’m happy with.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum suggestions
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

We could do that, but it seems better to just write a better theme for SMF. Unless I just have no idea what you guys are talking about.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum suggestions
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Why don’t we just write an android/iPhone app as a community project that browses the forum.

That way it’s free, can be open source and is educational.

Plus it’s pretty damn basic.

Heck, we could add optional IRC integration if we really wanted.

item.title: Forum suggestions
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

I don’t currently have a computer so I use my phone. Nothing wrong with checking it on the go either.

Using tapatalk is much less painful than using any browser on my milestone. Its bullshit slow, the app isn’t.

Read full topic

[/quote]
Oh you had your days.[/quote]But I didn’t need to bring MITB everywhere I went. IRC is a different story though LoL
